backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that includes blob storage mixin and provides a getTestSuite query function which generates test cases across seven categories (functional, boundary, edge, exploratory, positive, negative, orderedSequence) from an array of requirement text strings.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three high-confidence features: file upload for Word documents, organized test case display with categorization, and professional testing-focused visual design, each mapped to specific files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend TypeScript/React files covering routing, layout, file upload with drag-and-drop, test case display with tabs, custom hooks for upload/generation/export, and Tailwind styling with OKLCH color system for test categories.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes, including custom chart colors and sidebar theming with professional testing-focused palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with UTF-8 charset, viewport meta tag, 'Test Case Generator' title, root div, and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup creating root route with Layout component and index route pointing to GeneratorPage, with TypeScript module augmentation for router type registration.
frontend/src/components/FileUpload.tsx: File upload component with drag-and-drop zone, file validation for .doc/.docx formats, progress bar during upload, success/error alerts, and integration with useFileUpload hook to process files and pass requirements to parent.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Application layout with sticky header containing FileCheck2 icon and app branding, main content area with Outlet for routing, and footer with copyright and caffeine.ai attribution link using app identifier.
frontend/src/components/TestCaseCard.tsx: Card component rendering individual test case with color-coded badge, type label, description, preconditions with warning icon, numbered test steps, and expected results with checkmark icon, using category-specific color mapping.
React component that displays a test suite with summary statistics, export buttons (copy/download), and tabbed views for different test categories (functional, boundary, edge, exploratory, positive, negative). Uses shadcn/ui components and the useTestCaseExport hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages the ICP backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state. Invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFileUpload.ts: React hook for handling .doc/.docx file uploads, validating file types, simulating upload progress, and parsing requirements from document text. Returns file state, progress, status, and processing functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient configuration. Provides identity, login status, and authentication functions to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file with no implementation, kept for template structure consistency.
frontend/src/hooks/useTestCaseExport.ts: React hook that formats TestSuite data into structured text reports and provides functions to copy to clipboard or download as a text file. Includes formatting for all test categories and execution sequences.
frontend/src/hooks/useTestGeneration.ts: React hook that calls the backend actor's getTestSuite method with requirements array, managing loading state, errors, and storing the generated TestSuite result.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, defining a professional testing tool color palette including category-specific colors (functional, boundary, edge, exploratory, positive, negative) and typography improvements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider for React Query and InternetIdentityProvider for ICP authentication, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/GeneratorPage.tsx: Main page component that orchestrates the test case generation workflow with four states: upload, processing, results, and error. Renders FileUpload, TestCaseDisplay, and status UI based on current workflow state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color tokens using OKLCH color space, including theme colors (primary, secondary, destructive, etc.) and test category colors (functional, boundary, edge, exploratory, positive, negative). Extends default theme with custom container, border radius, shadows, and font families.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking the test case generation app's architecture, existing features (file upload, test case display, professional design), and pending feature requests for document parsing and comprehensive test case generation across multiple categories.
